John Ighodaro (amụrụ (1990-07-05)July 5, 1990), onye a maara dịka Johnny Drille, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Ọrụ ya pụtara ìhè mgbe ọ wepụtara mkpuchi nke "Awww" nke Di'Ja
Ọ bịanyere aka na Mavin Records ugbu a.
A mụrụ Johnny Drille ma zụlite ya na Edo State, Nigeria
Nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye ụkọchukwu
Drille malitere ịbụ abụ na chọọchị nna ya mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Benin, Benin City, ebe ọ gụrụ Bekee na Akwụkwọ.
Drille malitere ọrụ egwu ya na chọọchị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-asọmpi na oge nke isii nke Project Fame West Africa na 2013. N'afọ 2015, o wepụtara mkpuchi nke Di'Ja's "Awww", nke dọtara uche onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Mavin bụ Don Jazzy
E wepụtara egwu izizi ya "Wait for Me" n'afọ 2015
A họpụtara ya maka Best Alternative Song na The Headies 2016

Ya na Niniola, onye otu ya na-asọmpi oge nke isii, jikọrọ aka dekọọ "Start All Over". Na Febụwarị 2017, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Mavin Records.
Na Septemba 3, 2021, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya, nke nwere ọrụ egwu iri na anọ, tupu anyị ehi ụra nke gosipụtara ndị Naịjirịa na ndị na-ese ihe, Ayra Starr, Ladipoe, ndị ukwe obodo Lagos, Don Jazzy,Chylde,Kwitte, Cilsoul na ndị otu afro R&B, Syl plus n'okpuru akara Mavin Records.
